post.body: So what is the new schedule? Wake @ noon...have breakfast...read for 3-4 hrs...nap...go to starbucks and read till 10pm?
Welcome back to the world of the day-walkers.
We do have a ton of snow I still made it to work though. Lucky me
Stay warm Kerry! I know if my power goes out this weekend I'm totally screwed. Hey I was at the Obsidian show a few weeks ago!
I'm doing well. The weathermen keep threatening lots of snow but so far We have not seen much. How are things in CA.?
That sounds delicious. I want to go home and cook now
love what you do Eley, looking forward to your next release. Best wishes to you and your family.
Just installed a new copy/scan/printer for the office. While it can do more than the old unit it does it much more slowly. I'm still happy
The company is currently embroiled in a discrimination law suite. Meetings with lawyers all day today. :~(
Had 3 course fondue tonight...I am very stuffed and going to go lie down for a while.
accidentally watched the first episode of KissxSis without knowing what it was about..... Should have seen that one coming. ouch!
Working from home and texting my boss
I already knew that Amanda Palmer was awesome but this just solidifies the fact http://tinyurl.com/3p794f
How is it that nobody told me about this http://tinyurl.com/3p794f
Wow! This horrible weather has really been great for business. For me at least.
I'm getting on the Marnie Stern band wagon. I hope she sticks around for a while and continues to develop her very impressive talent.
we are finally getting some good snow here in Seattle
http://tinyurl.com/4n3bwm I never thought about playing Indian ragas on a piano. Beautiful!
$288 dollars missing from the Front Desk yesterday!!! Somebody's getting fired... unfortunately that means more work for me :~(
just discovered chinasmack.com Awesome!
